job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Qualifications - Proficient with systems thinking, able to write software with code in a language that allows them to be successful in: JavaScript, NextJS, ReactJS, TypeScript, GraphQL (Apollo), MongoDB Responsibilities - What ongoing activities is the role responsible for? - Making the software systems that allows users to be successful in Murmur. - Talking to users to better understand the connection between what is being built and maintained and what is adding or reducing value in the market. - Observing the software systems to optimize the implementation level of Murmur. - Tending the software systems to keep them easy to reason about. - Collaborating cross-functionally with other roles in Murmur in making decisions about features and functionalities of Murmur. - Building resilient software through writing tests and documentation. - Documenting how and why the software systems are built the way they are.
